title: REPLIES TO COMMENTS
content: I attach importance to replying as promptly as I can to comments. I normally receive an email informing me of each new comment. I have just discovered that Blogger for some unexplained  reason has stopped sending me the emails. First of all I will now reply to outstanding comments before I investigate. Apologies, although not my fault, for my lack of response.

feed.description:
To newcomers.
At the bottom of each post is the word "comments" which when clicked shows comments made by followers, and also giving you the opportunity to comment if you wish. I have found that many people overlook this part of the post which is often mo
